website_summaries.verdict: This cute and cozy ankle boot earns plenty of praise for its slim, streamlined profile. Affordable Ugg option with the same signature materials as other Uggs.
pros: Shaft measures 4.5 inches from arch and features a deep-V design to create ankle exposure
Moccasin-inspired band adds just enough pizzazz without breaking from the traditional Ugg style
cons: Need to be broken in to achieve optimal comfort
Some consumers feel foot conditions like high or fallen arches could affect overall fit

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfy, but tight.
customer_reviews.text: They fit great, only issue is they are pretty hard to slip on, tried with and without socks. Maybe order a size up if you wish to slide your foot in and out of these.
customer_reviews.author: Yaneli

customer_reviews.title: Love the boot, but came with a marking.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to find these on Amazon. They arrived on time but I was a bit disappointed in packing. The box was in tact but the boots weren’t placed in individual plastic bags. I also noticed a tiny marking. Not a deal breaker, but for the price, I’d prefer them to be prestine. I normally wear size 7 in Uggs. I’m happy I tried these on at a department store. Definitely order up in size. The 7.5 fir just right. They are a tad hard to put on, but with time, I feel they’ll stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Cake

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and a great buy
customer_reviews.text: These Uggs are so comfortable, keep your feet warm, look awesome not big clod hopper looking! Lol! I wear a size 6 m but I went up a 1/2 size and they are just right for me. I wear them with thin socks. If you have a wide foot then I don't think these are for you. They are a little tight and hard to get on the first couple of times but after that they are great! I wore these for over 10 hrs. Awesome shoes! I have gotten a lot of compliments on these shoes. Thanks Amazon.com for offering great products!
customer_reviews.author: dorothy a

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Pair of UGG boots, by far!
customer_reviews.text: These booties are AMAZING!!! I was a little hesitant ordering my normal size based of the reviews of them being too narrow and smaller than usual UGG boots, but they’re PERFECT! My left foot is slightly bigger than the right too- no issues at all- comfortable fit! If you have a wider foot it may be hard for you to get them on (at first, they’ll soften up) but I didn’t have an issue! I also love the fact that they are not bulky like UGG’s usually are. In fact they make my feet look small. I love them so much I just ordered the same pair in black- size 10!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Hibbard

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8.5 boot and got the 9. I can easily get the boot off and on. Would prefer the boot be a little longer, my toes are at the end. I love the look and comfort. I wear orthotics for arch support and they fit inside.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Cool and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfortable, perfect style. Fit as expected. I've been rocking mines for a couple of weeks, and at first it was snug a bit but now it's perfect. I ordered a 7.5 for my 7.5 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Anyam

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 7 in typical shoes but took the advice of others and ordered up. The 7 1/2 fits perfectly and they are warm. I like th lower boot and the boot shape as it looks better with my jeans and pants. Yay for these boots!
customer_reviews.author: S Richards

customer_reviews.title: My daughter LOVES them!!
customer_reviews.text: We saw these in a store and they didn't have her size so of course, I ordered them from Amazon. They are adorable. In between a boot and shoe. They are a perfect height on her leg and the rubber sole and heel make them easy to walk around in. She absolutely loves them and they look super cute on her (she's 21) I would definitely recommend these to anyone thinking about getting them. They fit true to size and they are super comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Yoli from NJ

customer_reviews.title: Try prime wardrobe to figure out size
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 pairs through prime wardrobe size 7.5(usual shoe size) and size 8 due to usual ugg size. Size 8 was too big in the mckay unless I wanted to wear super thick socks and even then the inner lining of uggs does eventually conform and flatten to your feet. The 7.5 were a bit too snug for socks but with sock liners or barefoot they feel amazing. Like other reviewer(s) there were minor markings that I believe for 150 bucks doesnt belong there. Let the owner get them dirty not the seller. Otherwise cute shoe and will make the best of it.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: so small and awful!
customer_reviews.text: I literally can’t fit my left foot inside. they’re so cute and i’ve tried time and time and again to get my feet in but they won’t fit!! I thought I could force them in but it isn’t working and it’s too late to return them so I have no clue what to do with them but what a huge waste of money!!! regular ugg’s are soo much better!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn D

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to get on
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted these to work out. I liked that they were more narrow than the normal Ugg boots, but still had the super soft lining. But I was like a number of other reviewers that found it impossible to get these boots on. Sadly next size up isn’t an option for me. I wish they had a little zipper on the side to just make getting them on and off easier. Back these go!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Order your usual size.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute boot. I normally wear 7.5 to an 8 size but decided to size up to an 8 due to the reviews. I wish I would have ordered a 7.5. The 8 were too loose and I knew over time the lining would eventually become compacted making the book even more loose. Personally, I would recommend ordering your usual size. I'm going to return the 8 and get a 7.5.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet!
customer_reviews.text: These are just like every other ugg they are a little snug at 1st and then they adjust to your feet- I know some people said they had a hard time getting them on, but I did not. I did size up from what normaly buy. If you have a wide foot these are probly not for you. They are a little more narrow than the typical ugg boot. I live in AZ so they are perfect for our climate, not too hot... I am really happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect quality
customer_reviews.text: These boots are adorable, I love them the match every thing. But the her very full of fur so make sure to account for that when your order your size I like my shoes, especially uggs a little loose, and i wear an 8 ordered 8 1/2. I wish I’d have ordered a 9 lol so take that for what it is. And I usually don’t wear socks with them because they feel to tight.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Sieben

customer_reviews.title: 💕 Uggs
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very warm, but beware of sizing. I purchased a whole size bigger than my normal size and they fit great. Other reviewers said they are tight and couldn’t get their foot in, but going up a size, I didn’t have any problem. I have always done this with Uggs.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the next size up (7.5 when I'm usually a 7) due to reading multiple customer reviews that said they were too tight but the next size up is almost too large, even with heavy socks. I will likely return them for my normal/true size. Otherwise, no compliants. These arrived quickly & are of great quality. I can't wait to wear them!
customer_reviews.author: MRock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had all kind of UGGs in my life but i looove this one the most. I am 5.3” and 103 pounds and i was looking for something shorter than regular short ugg boots because those make me look shorter. This is just perfect, very warm and the height goes until ankle. Just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Gago

customer_reviews.title: 9.5 is almost too snug if you wear thick socks but works great with thin
customer_reviews.text: if you plan on wearing thick socks order a size up. i tend to wear a 9 to 9.5 in most brands but very glad I ordered a 9.5 in Uggs. Great shoes..very warm and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: cathy

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot! They are a little more low profile/sleek than regular Uggs, but I wear Uggs to keep my feet warm, not for high fashion. They are easy to get on and off. I wear a 6-6 1⁄2 in regular shoes, but have always worn a size 7 in Uggs. Same with these. Size 7.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Toe area is tight
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 7 but had to go up to 7.5 because my big toe was being pressed down. Not enough room in the toe from above. Glad I tried these in in Macy’s before I purchased here on amazon otherwise I’d have had to send them back and that’s always annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Keri-Anne

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but they run SHORT
customer_reviews.text: Very cute bootie, I won't deny that. Finally different from my usual pairs of Uggs; they have more style to them and looks great with ankle denim. I wear a 9 in their boots but I had to return them cause they hit the top of my toes in the worst way, even with me being a narrow. I'm hoping a 9.5 works.
customer_reviews.author: Preslie 0108

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I think I am done with UGGS. Their quality has gone done severely. The suede is so thin that the slightest abrasion could tear it and they have no means of repairing their own shoes.
customer_reviews.author: savvy shopper03

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty disappointed as for the price I thought these should fit. I found one of the boots super tight, the other fit fine. I don't normally have an issue as both my feet are the same size. I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: WalleyeBandit

customer_reviews.title: Loooove these!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these boots! Get compliments all the time too! They are sooo comfy & warm. Do wish they had a removable insole so it could be replaced, but otherwise really happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Krysie B

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable more than stylish.
customer_reviews.text: This bootie is very comfortable, even without socks! I’m typically a 6 to 6-1/2, and a 6-1/2 fit great. My only complaint is that they are not as stylish as I imagined from the picture. The look more like a bootie version of the traditional Ugg.
customer_reviews.author: TiffP

customer_reviews.title: Too cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Such an updated look for UGGS! I normally wear an 8 in UGG boots but ordered an 8.5 per other reviews and I think I made the right choice. They are warm and perfect for Chicago fall weather. I love that the lip can be worn up or down.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Z

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, I love them.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are warm and stylish. I ordered a half size bigger than I normally take for thicker socks. They are a bit tight so run a little bit smaller than I thought they would be. I still love them, but can't wear thicker winter socks with them.
customer_reviews.author: Rustburn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and goes with anything! I love UGG’s but some are clunky. This is perfect cross between everyday wear and trusted name of UGG products!
customer_reviews.author: wendy robinson

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought These last year and I honestly Wore them almost everyday. They were my definitely go to shoe. I love Uggs and this style was amazing
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Awful Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was initially excited to buy these unfortunately once I opened the damaged box my excitement faded. The black seems to be faded and it seems that the left shoe is newer and the right one has been worn. The right shoe flap keeps folding over and will not stay up it is extremely loose to the point my foot slides somewhat out of it. The left shoe is very tight as one would expect of newer uggs. Disappointing to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: inlove with Boots Cute Cute 😍
customer_reviews.text: I'm so inlove with these boots they are really cute I generally wear a size 9 in UGG but I went up a size because on it is close fitted I will be able to wear a sock in it and have a comfortable fit
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Mason

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable, Comfortable, but flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning boots are extremely hard to put on, but the boot stretches. Boots are extremely comfortable, I ordered half a size up, and fashionable. The only reason I returned is because the flap on the left foot doesn’t stay up...so it looks like a slipper.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots
customer_reviews.text: They are about a half size off if you’re accounting for the fur lining. I wear an 8 but ordered an 8.5 and they fit perfectly, I wore them for the first around the house and walking my dog I really love the comfort and bootie look!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and delivered in 2 days. Retail stores just don't carry enough stock so. If you are sure about your size, you cannot beat Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen E. Granlund

customer_reviews.title: Great little boot
customer_reviews.text: I have worn out 2 other pair and just found these on amazon. Speedy deliver and new original style.
customer_reviews.author: TCB

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Designed
customer_reviews.text: Nice, cute boot, but poor design makes it impossible to wear. There is no space for toes, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: LAN

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about the boots. They fit well, they are comfortable and we’re exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: LOVE them but half size up!
customer_reviews.text: I did have to go up a size in these from an 8 to 8 1/2, but they are my favorite pair of uggs I’ve ever owned. They are gorgeous, warm, and look dressier than my other Uggs. I’ve had a crush on these boots for a while and I’m really excited that they’re finally mine!
customer_reviews.author: mcm

customer_reviews.title: Left shoe doesn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: I can’t get the left shoe on without a struggle. Both shoes have a ridge of fur under the toe area that is very uncomfortable. So disappointed I have wanted these shoes so long .
customer_reviews.author: P wag

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but snug fit.
customer_reviews.text: I love the boots but are very tight. The leather may stretch some but they are tight over the top of my foot. Normally would wear a 9.5. Bought 10.
customer_reviews.author: Della Hillerman

customer_reviews.title: My go to boots for fall and winter!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9 and ordered a 9 and they are perfect. I have narrow feet and was concerned they would be a little big due to reviews but not the case. I’ll probably get the black as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Run REALLY SMALL!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, but had to return them...Purchased a 9.5 for my mom and barely fit my size 8 feet! The bigger ones we replaced them with are much loved!
customer_reviews.author: NoFences

customer_reviews.title: A bit hard to put on
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to put on compared to other uggs. They looks a little nicer and you can dress them up a bit more. Overall I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dana gamaleri

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Ugg Booties!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these booties! Super cute and they keep your feet warm! I'm glad I read the reviews and saw the recommendation to order a half size up due to them being tight. I normally wear an 8 in Ugg boots and decided to order an 8.5 in these. Best decision! They were a little tight getting on at first but after loosening them up a bit they fit just like an 8 does.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Belchatovski

customer_reviews.title: Nice look-runs small
customer_reviews.text: I generally wear a size 6. But read some reviews that reference runs small. Went up a 1/2 size. Still pretty snug. Not loving these
customer_reviews.author: shopping experience

customer_reviews.title: They look amazing!
customer_reviews.text: They were for my best friend Christmas present and she loved them! Also people have been asking the brand since they look like regular boots most people don’t believe they are Uggs! So over all great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MONTYHADES

customer_reviews.title: Ugg McKay
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that it did not arrived in original box. That’s a huge negative for me. Since this was a birthday present I was giving to my friend.
customer_reviews.author: teddyleo

customer_reviews.title: It is a little snug at first when you put it on but it stretches and fits comfortably
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like the picture, it is very warm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: marcia

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: I don't have to wear thick socks, because its warm enough.
customer_reviews.author: audie

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Just what I expected. Comfortable, cute. I ordered my normal size, fit is just right, I just wouldn’t wear a thick sock with these boots. All the fur keeps your feet cozy and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Curtis

customer_reviews.title: An Ugg that is cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These Uggs are just like wearing a pair of bedroom slippers and they are so cute. I have low arches and narrow feet so I am able to easily slip them on and keep them on unlike some of the other reviewers. They fit perfectly as I am a 6.5 and ordered a 6.5. I just love them.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Shoes both different in sizes
customer_reviews.text: My right shoe is smaller (although not in different size) than the left one. It feels so awkward to walk in those shoes even after wearing it for a year. Not buying UGG online again. Maybe in stores so i can try them on.
customer_reviews.author: Khulan Gantsog

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit Uggs!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT real Uggs! The logo on the side and bottom of the sole are lacking the registered trademark symbol. The fabric feels cheap and the fur is off. I haven't even had them a month and have barely worn them but they feel worn down. The fit is off too. Save yourself my mistake and don't buy these. Go order straight from the Ugg site. Disappointed I didn't thoroughly read the reviews first....
customer_reviews.author: R_berg

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love those! Fit TTS for me. I will live in these this winter.
customer_reviews.author: JMM

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I've only had them about a week now but they keep me feet so warm. I would suggest ordering a half size up. I usually wear a 9 and ordered a 9.5 and they were a little snug but they are already loosening up. I was a little hesitant to spend this much on a pair of boots but I can already tell they were worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Nida

customer_reviews.title: Too small style okay
customer_reviews.text: could barely get these on (I know UGG's run small cuz they stretch but this was ridiculous). Style was okay in person. Returned them
customer_reviews.author: Margie Gordillo

customer_reviews.title: and was not perfectly comfortable. So I returned 7
customer_reviews.text: I purchased W7.5, I checked size chart, and it said Ugg 7.5 is same size as Nike 7.5, which I normally buy for Nike. I could wear the boots, but it is somewhat small, and was not perfectly comfortable. So I returned 7.5, and repurchased 8.0.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go up half a size
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my wife but the fit was too tight and they were a battle to get on so I returned them for a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Returned- probably not good for Narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: I wound up returning. I have a narrow foot and the opening around the ankles, loose with no way to tighten, just had them feeling more floppy than I really wanted.
customer_reviews.author: LauraW

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Boot!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are absolutely perfect! They fit true to size and are so comfortable. I am just waiting for cooler weather to wear them every day!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Size up one size to slip on without pulling on them
customer_reviews.author: Charlette Bowling

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & warm
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much for the northeast winter weather we get. I would simply suggest to go a half size bigger when ordering as the decorative strap can make it difficult to slip on if you have higher navicular bones.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Tight boot
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning the boots. They look adorable but where very tight in the ankle and difficult to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D.

customer_reviews.title: The shoes run small, I cannot wear socks with them but they feel very good without socks
customer_reviews.text: One review said they ran big, I ordered a half size under what I normally wear, they were too small and I returned them and ordered my regular size and they are too small to wear socks with.
customer_reviews.author: Tommie G. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Order .5 size up. Great winter shoe ❄️
customer_reviews.text: Order .5 size larger to accommodate space for the shearling lining. Very toasty and comfy. A must buy for cold winters.
customer_reviews.author: smartshopp1922

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Runs small. I sized up and those were too big.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: These might be the most comfortable boots I own. I love how they feel. They keep my feet warm and they look cute too. I did size up a half size. I usually wear 6.5 and I got a 7.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S

customer_reviews.title: Love Uggs!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are as adorable as they are comfortable! Love the way they feel on your feet. So soft! I love Uggs!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Debbra Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking
customer_reviews.text: Love the boot, but fits a little small. I had to exchange for a larger size. (Up half size). They are very nice looking with the small heel.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these boots but order your size according to your ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots but order your size according to your shoe size not your ugh boot size because these are shoe boots. I did that mistake.
customer_reviews.author: nails

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: First pair of Ugg’s. Fun with fall and winter outfits
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Howe

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. Not quite as chunky as my other Uggs. I did order the next half size up and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: These certainly must be mis-sized. I have 3 other pair of UGGs, all size 9. I ordered a 9.5 for these because that's all that was available, and I really wanted them. I had a difficult time getting them on, then my toes were at the very end. Returned!
customer_reviews.author: Jill LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Usually wear a size 7. Had to get a 7.5. Other than that they are super warm and cute
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They fit great and look awesone
customer_reviews.text: I love my McKay Winter Ugg boots they look great with any outfit and look stylish !! I’m going to order the black pair next!!
customer_reviews.author: raidog

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful.. comfortable... do not need to wear socks with Ugg’s. I have several pairs.. much better without socks. Very stylish. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Hill

customer_reviews.title: Classy, Comfy, Warm!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect boot! Didn’t want bulk like the typical UGG and wanted something “stylish” that could be worn to work in an office and needed the warmth! These fit the bill for what I was looking for! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That you can count on amazon to get it right
customer_reviews.text: They are for my granddaughter for Christmas so we will see. She asked for them so what’s a grandma to do. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these booties! Exactly what she wanted! 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Patricia G.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love my Ugg’s they fit true to size and keep your feet extremely warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots they notOnly feel good they look good too. Whould buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: They were tight on my wife's feet at first but ordered to size and still fit
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed with these boots
customer_reviews.text: They are super warm and cozy. I hate taking them off, they are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I odered up a size after reading other reviews. These fit perfectly and I like the slim look.
customer_reviews.author: LKW

customer_reviews.title: but exchange was perfect..
customer_reviews.text: Product was too small size, but exchange was perfect...thanks for the service!
customer_reviews.author: Brittan S.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these, but they were to difficult to put on. Tight fit to get on, but the size was correct.
customer_reviews.author: Tvan1

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have small feet and i could not even get these on. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sego

customer_reviews.title: Not what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Very tight and hard to get even a slim wide foot in
customer_reviews.author: I Only Speak The Truth

customer_reviews.title: Possible fakes!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I do not think these are the real deal. Fur feels SO fake.
customer_reviews.author: Stamay

customer_reviews.title: Prompt delivery
customer_reviews.text: These Ugg booties are wonderful. They are great and look even better in person. May purchase again in another color.
customer_reviews.author: elaine m.close

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered larger to wear thicker socks with,I'm a size 8 1/2
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor traction. Get wet easily
customer_reviews.text: They’re really just modified slippers. Poor traction. Get wet easily. Would not recommend though they are cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Stearn

customer_reviews.title: Ran too small!
customer_reviews.text: These were beautiful boots but apparently there was a stitching error and I could not it on my foot. I have brown ones and have no problems getting them on so it might have been a manufacturer’s error.
customer_reviews.author: Debra VanEvery

customer_reviews.title: Ugg Ankle Boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so comfortable, I don't even know I'm wearing them. Love my UGGs.
customer_reviews.author: Fay Hafer

customer_reviews.title: Heel was wide
customer_reviews.text: These boots were beautiful & well made but the size of the heel was way too wide. My heels kept slipping so had to send the boots back.
customer_reviews.author: JollyJo

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Had to send the first back wife could not get them on when I got her size. This shoe runs small so go the next size up like we did and they fit her wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, add a half size.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of them, they aren't the easiest to get on though. I felt like my toes were at the very tip of the boot, definitely add at least a half size up to feel more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally grabbed them from out of stock❤️
customer_reviews.text: Fits like all Ugg’s. Tried for 2 seasons to get this style! Love them, my new favs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort at its best
customer_reviews.text: Love my uggs . For me they are easy on easy off. Like wearing slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Ankle strap way too tight
customer_reviews.text: Strap around ankle made it almost impossible to get on/off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: UGG Women's Mckay Winter Boot
product_meta.description: Classic boot . Care instructions: They come pretreated out of the box but clean and re-treat them every couple of seasons to extend their longevity and keep them looking their best
